text: Dragan Tomić (; 9 December 1935 – 21 June 2022) was a Serbian politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party of Serbia. He was the President of the National Assembly from 1994 to 2001. He supported dictator Slobodan Milošević. From 1998 until 2000, he was the Deputy Prime Minister of Serbia. For a short time in 1997, he was the Acting President of Serbia. Tomić died on 21 June 2022 in Belgrade, Serbia.Umro Dragan Tomić ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Legislative speakers Category:Presidents of Serbia
title: Dragan Tomić
